statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold > 10;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT product_category, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_category;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_sales_count FROM sales_data GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_sales_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount DESC, quantity_sold ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_name) AS unique_products_sold FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY unique_products_sold DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND quantity_sold >= 5 ORDER BY sale_amount/quantity_sold DESC, sale_date ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale_amount, MAX(sale_amount) AS max_sale_amount, MIN(sale_amount) AS min_sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_category IN ('Clothing', 'Accessories');
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, price, order_date FROM sales_data WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE quantity_in_stock > 100 ORDER BY last_stock_update DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT order_id, product_id, price * quantity AS total_price FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM sales_data WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT s.product_id, s.quantity, i.quantity_in_stock FROM sales_data s JOIN inventory_data i ON s.product_id = i.product_id WHERE s.quantity > i.quantity_in_stock;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, price FROM sales_data WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY price ASC, order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, current_price FROM products;
SELECT order_id, quantity, price FROM sales_data WHERE transaction_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT category, current_price FROM products ORDER BY current_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY order_id, product_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT SUM(price) AS total_revenue FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM products INNER JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM products ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data
SELECT product_name, product_category, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT product_name, unit_price, product_category FROM products JOIN pricing_strategies ON products.product_category = pricing_strategies.product_category
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, unit_price * available_quantity AS total_price FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id;
SELECT product_name, product_category, sale_amount FROM products p JOIN sales_data s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;

SELECT product_name, unit_price * (1 - discount_rate) AS discounted_price FROM products p JOIN pricing_strategies ps ON p.product_category = ps.product_category WHERE discount_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY discounted_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, quantity_in_stock FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT product_id, dynamic_pricing_enabled, markdown_percentage FROM pricing_strategies WHERE dynamic_pricing_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data JOIN customers ON sales_data.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON sales_data.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY sale_amount DESC, customer_name ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, product_name, product_category, sale_amount FROM sales_data JOIN customers ON sales_data.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON sales_data.product_id = products.product_id WHERE sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, product_id, transaction_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount < 50 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT product_name, product_category, AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale_amount FROM sales_data JOIN products ON sales_data.product_id = products.product_id GROUP BY product_name, product_category ORDER BY average_sale_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
